Package imagingbook.common.image.matching

Class ChamferMatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.common.image.matching.ChamferMatcher
  • public class ChamferMatcher
extends Object

    Instances of this class perform "chamfer" matching on binary images. The "search" image I (to be searched for matches of the "reference" image R) is initially associated with the ChamferMatcher. The assumption is, that the search image I is fixed and the ChamferMatcher tries to match multiple reference images R. All images are considered binary, with non-zero values taken as foreground pixels. See Sec. 23.2.3 (Alg. 23.3) of [1] for additional details.

    [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, Digital Image Processing – An Algorithmic Introduction, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).

    Version:
    2021/11/26, 2022/09/16 revised

    • Method Detail

      • getMatch

        public float[][] getMatch​(ij.process.ByteProcessor R)
        Matches the specified reference image R to the (fixed) search image I.
        Parameters:
        R - some binary reference image
        Returns:
        a 2D array Q[r][s] of match scores

      • getMatch

        public float[][] getMatch​(Pnt2d.PntInt[] points,
                          int width,
                          int height)
        Matches the specified point set to the (fixed) search image I. The points represent the foreground pixels of a virtual reference image (R) with the specified width and height.
        Parameters:
        points - a set of foreground points
        width - the width of the virtual reference image
        height - the height of the virtual reference image
        Returns:
        a 2D array Q[r][s] of match scores of size width x height
